coded_answer.p: I received your letter and I am very glad I have won a two weekstwo-week traveltrip to Camp California. I will give you some information which helpswill help you to know me better.

I would like to travel to the camp in July because this is the best time for me and I hope for you. I will be very busy in June so let me tell you some details about my traveltrip. AboutRegarding accommodation, I think tents would be great.

Basketball and swimming I think are the best for the children. Basketball will help the children to build team characterspirit and leadership skills. And swimming is very good for their health. I swim really goodwell and I am a proffesionalprofessional basketball player. I count on my experience.
And there are a few questions I would like to ask. First, what clothes should I take with me, secondly.? Secondly, how much money and should I pay by cash or by travel cards.? Thanks!
I am looking forward to our meeting.
Last month I enjoyed helping at the concert of "Modern Talking'' and now I want to share with you about my experience.
It all started when one of the organizers asked me to help him at a concert of my favoritefavourite band. And what do you think I answered? Of course, yes!

I havehad gottaken on very responsibledemanding work. I had to bring food for Peter Bolen and Tomas Anders. Can you imagine? I camewent into their room and givegave hot Cheeseburgers, Coca-Cola and ice-cream to Peter. It was the happiest moment of my life. He asked me was the cheeseburger hotwhether the cheeseburger was hot and I answered that it was. I was very nervous talking with him. He told me about a concert programme and gave me his photo with aan signautograph.
I will never forget that summer day. It was my day, I am sure about it.
Well, I think that is all. See you.
